text: From the gold Gideon made an ephod,8:27. The breastplate worn by the high priest. This action by Gideon suggests that he thought a center of worship should be established in Ophrah. which he placed in his hometown of Ophrah. All Israel prostituted themselves there by worshiping it as an idol,8:27. “By worshiping it as an idol”: supplied for clarity. and it became a trap to Gideon and his family.
